works.name: Wildflowers
works.description: Developed an online portfolio for a local wedding florist with no previous web presence and implemented a full SEO strategy and competitive analysis to successfully improve Google rankings for selected keywords.

works.name: Legin Knits
works.description: I was brought on to fortify security to an existing Wordpress site and update product assortment to Legin Knit’s Shopify store — a local business specializing in knitted goods and other apparel.

works.name: Bremont
works.description: Contracted by a local agency, 52Pickup, I created a custom Wordpress theme and built a 12-page responsive site based on the client’s PSD mockup for a housing development project.
